name: SE2-13 — COUNCIL OF MISSION LODGE
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Mission Lodge (Sans Souci, Mahé). Stones that watched the island's heart
cast shadows pointing to the high road.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: arch shadows align to heading; seal wax hides letter.
properties.clue:
Stones that watched the island's heart
cast shadows pointing to the high road.
